body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Photos & Multimedia             Photos & Multimedia           Experience the ever changing diversity at the Aquatic Gardens M. Marquez  There is more to the park than July's lotus or summer waterliles. Go to the photo gallery for more images of this quiet place through the year. See the gardens inhabitants, wildlife, and all that's happening in the park.
title: Kenilworth Park & Aquatic Gardens: Photos & Multimedia
